title: Tapbots Releases Ivory 2.3 — and Announces That Phoenix, a Bluesky Client, Is Coming
author: John Gruber
excerpt: Attached: 1 image :appicon_ivory: v2.3 is now available on the App Store for Mac and iOS/iPadOS! What's new? - Grouped Notifications (Mention and Notification tabs are now merged) - Support for AlphaNumeric Post IDs (Can now log into more services like GoToSocial) - Accessibility Improvements - Bug Fixes https://apps.apple.com/us/app/ivory-for-mastodon-by-tapbots/id6444602274
